entry.title: WIND WARNING , Squamish
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:46 AM PST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.4°C

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early this morning. 60 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Tuesday 21 February 2023
